name: Scruffy's Treasure Hunt
description:
Scruffy’s Treasure Hunt is a charming, 1-4 player turn-based strategy game where players explore and dig up a beach to accumulate the biggest, most valuable Treasure hoard. At the start of each game, players choose a Character, then take turns rolling, moving, and digging their way to victory. 

It is the digital adaptation of the board game of the same name.

  • Play as 7 Characters with unique abilities
  • Randomized setups each game
  • Nonviolent, Easy-to-Learn Game
  • Singleplayer (vs AI) and Multiplayer (Local) Modes
  • Fun, Vibrant Art Direction

This is a game played entirely with the Mouse.

Left-Mouse Click: Move to Tile / Select Action

Left-Click + Hold: Dig Tile / Drag Card
